abstract: "Amy" is scheduled for publication next summer.
snippet: "Amy" is scheduled for publication next summer.
lead_paragraph: Less than three months after the death of his daughter, Mitch Winehouse has made a deal to write a book about her, his publisher said on Monday. The book, titled "Amy," is "a heartfelt and revelatory memoir" that will tell what Mr. Winehouse says is the true story of Amy Winehouse's life.

headline.main: Amy Winehouse's Father Signs Deal to Write Book About Her
